data.title: Renault-Nissan Alliance - vehicle sales worldwide by region 2018
data.meta_description: In 2018, the Renault-Nissan Alliance sold almost 764,000 vehicles to customers in its third largest market, France.

Supplementary notes

The alliance includes Renault Group and Nissan Motor Co., Ltd., and builds Renault, Nissan, Datsun and Lada models at the AVTOVAZ plant in Togliatti; the Chinese joint-venture partner is Dongfeng Motor, according to the source.
